VFX 作り 込み 舞台 立て 好き 加味 評価. 戦闘 前 一瞬 ポーズ 決めて 向かっ く とか 日本 特撮 愛 ぽく キライになれない ね. 現行 第一線 ヒーロー 映画 どれ だけ すごい 浮き彫り 意味 必見 思い. みなさん ハードル いったん 下げ ましょ.

Max Steel is finally here !!!!!. ...... said no one ever. I remember the Max Steel action figures when I was a kid The villain Psycho had a skull face and he was pretty cool So I wanted to see him in this movie. Sadly we don t get to see that But what we get is a superhero origin story with one of the worst protagonists I've ever seen. The kid who plays Max who looks like a poor m a n's Andrew Garfield is so lifeless and dull in regards to his performance He has no charisma makes a lot of dumb decisions and his bland facial expression is one of the man y reasons that make this movie boring. Andy Garcia and Maria Bello ..... what the hell are they doing here ??. The color ing of this film has a grimy looking filter and it looks so cheap The CGI also doesn't do much either. The editing was very weird A lot of scenes are cut and pasted awkwardly In a dinner scene they keep showing a team of mercenaries infiltrating a facility that had nothing to do with t he scene itself. I thought Fantastic Four last year was a half assed attempt at a superhero movie But this here takes the c rown for worst superhero movie of the last 6 years.
